name: Polenta with Fresh Corn And Sage
keywords: chicken stock, corn kernels, yellow cornmeal, gluten-free, nut-free, side dish, summer
recipeIngredient: Salt and freshly-ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Bring stock to a simmer in a heavy saucepan. Add cornmeal slowly in thin stream, stirring constantly.
Cook, stirring, for about five minutes, then fold in the remaining ingredients. Cook 5 to 10 minutes longer, until the mixture has thickened but is not stiff. Serve at once.
